long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to browse around the web as you normally would. Once you are at a web page that you find interesting, you can click the button and Postradamus will make it very quick and easy to share that web page (or the images on the web page) to one of your social media properties using Postradamus.

See https://postradam.us for details on Postradamus.

You have 2 choices for sharing, using this chrome extension.

1) You can share the web page as a single post. For example you are at an article about Dog grooming. You can share the article instantly or add it to a list.

2) You can share one or more images found on the web page. For example, you go to Google images and search for "Dog Grooming". Many images will come up in Google image search. Postradamus will find all those images and allow you to choose one or more to share instantly or add to a list.
